commands.label: Attach to Vest
commands.command: /me takes out a bodycam from their vest pocket and attaches it securely to the shoulder strap

commands.label: Turn On Bodycam
commands.command: /me presses the power button on the bodycam, ensuring it starts recording

commands.label: Check Recording
commands.command: /me taps the bodycam display to verify active recording status

commands.label: Conceal on Shirt
commands.command: /me discreetly clips a small bodycam inside their shirt collar

commands.label: Activate Recording
commands.command: /me subtly activates the hidden bodycam with a quick button press

commands.label: Verify Active
commands.command: /do The bodycam blinks once, indicating it's recording

commands.label: Approach Vehicle
commands.command: /me approaches the vehicle cautiously, keeping hand near sidearm, bodycam recording

commands.label: Request Documents
commands.command: /me taps on the window and requests license, registration, and insurance

commands.label: Examine Documents
commands.command: /me examines the documents carefully while maintaining situational awareness

commands.label: Return Documents
commands.command: /me returns the documents along with a citation/warning

commands.label: Announce Arrest
commands.command: /me announces: 'You are under arrest for [charges]. You have the right to remain silent.'

commands.label: Handcuff Suspect
commands.command: /me instructs the suspect to turn around and place hands behind back, then applies handcuffs

commands.label: Pat Down
commands.command: /me conducts a thorough pat-down search for weapons and contraband

commands.label: Read Miranda Rights
commands.command: /me recites Miranda rights: 'You have the right to remain silent. Anything you say can be used against you in court...'

commands.label: Transport to Cruiser
commands.command: /me escorts the handcuffed suspect to the patrol vehicle and secures them in the back seat

commands.label: Secure Scene
commands.command: /me secures the crime scene with police tape, ensuring no contamination

commands.label: Photograph Evidence
commands.command: /me takes out a camera and photographs the evidence from multiple angles

commands.label: Collect Item
commands.command: /me puts on latex gloves and carefully places evidence into a labeled evidence bag

commands.label: Log Evidence
commands.command: /me logs the evidence in their notepad with location, time, and description

commands.label: Initiate Pursuit
commands.command: /me activates lights and sirens, announcing pursuit over radio: 'Unit [number] in pursuit of [vehicle description] heading [direction]'

commands.label: Call Out Location
commands.command: /me updates dispatch: 'Now heading [direction] on [street name], speed approximately [speed]'

commands.label: Deploy Spike Strips
commands.command: /me deploys spike strips across the roadway to disable the fleeing vehicle

commands.label: Terminate Pursuit
commands.command: /me announces over radio: 'Terminating pursuit due to [safety concerns/heavy traffic/etc.]'
